content.detailedDescription: Last night, i was driving in the car through my girlfriend's neighborhood.  after turning a bend in a dense residential area, i noticed a bright flash of light about 2-3 times the size of a normal star in the night sky.  i thought it was odd, but about a second later, what resembled a shooting star flew out of the bright star-like object.  the shooting star was only visible for a second, as it turned into something that we thought was a plane.   the bright star and the shooting star trail both disappeared simultaneously and my girlfriend and i thought we were imagining things.  from the end of the trial, what appeared to be an airliner making a descent toward the nearby airport was flying in the normal landing air pattern.   we noticed that, while at first too fast, it slowed down to the point that we wondered how it would make it all the way to the airport.  it then began to descend rapidly and we thought it was crashing.   as we were driving, we got directly under the object and got out of the car to look at it.   as it continued to descend, we saw one blinking light on the front, similar to an airliner, but three lights arranged in the shape of a triangle.   the lights of the city were shining in the distance and the object caught some of that light and we were able to make out a black triangle flying through the sky.   we watched in awe, not believing what we were seeing, as it continued to descend.   we lost sight of the object after it passed the treeline.   we both looked at each other and just asked 'did you see that?' at the same time.   we walked around outside for a minute or two when we heard a series of approximately 15-20 loud booms and flashes of light off in the direction that we lost sight of the object.    at this point, we were very weirded out and parked the car in her driveway and headed inside.
content.summary: Flash of light turned into shooting star which turned into a fast descending triangle

content.detailedDescription:
I never thought about reporting this until tonight listening to coast to coast.  my wife and i about 10 yrs ago were in palmdale ca (where my uncle retired from northrup as the head qc guy and i toured northrup with him in 1969 when i was visiting and in the usmc in mcas el toro ca)...

i saw only one small cloud in the sky and with my sunglasses (without them yo could still see it but not as good) could clearly see a black light slowly rotating counterclockwise.  the black light (no other way to describe it as it was black and clear but faint like something you could see through) was broken (spaces between the black light parts) and also curved being small near the cloud's edges and wider (and curved) as it went out from the cloud.  the edges of it ended in a perfect circle extending about twice the size of the cloud outward from it.

we just looked at it as it stayed there and after about 1/2 an hour got bored and left. i noticed it was very odd that not one person was there to share this sighting with but it was in the middle of the day in a residential area that my wife was a us census taker in at the time (which i made her quit that day because it is not safe to do as far as i was concerned).

that made me think that a lot of this stuff is government stuff.  i also took digital pics of a rainbow over a radio antenna tower for kvta in ventura ca near my old home and in the pics there were lots of yep,,, ufos that looked just like the flying hat ones.  i thought they might get energy from the towers or perhaps they can not see them but notice a strange energy coming from them in that area and investigate it??? just my thoughts about it.
content.summary: Hiding in the onlu cloud in sky - black rotating light extending from the cloud.

content.detailedDescription:
I arrived home at night, about 9:30 pm, (cst),and was in my yard looking at the stars before going inside, and i noticed a very bright light moving in a southerly direction. i assumed it was the space station, as i have heard it is as bright or brighter than venus, and it moved in a steady, fairly rapid trajectory. i watched it cross the sky and then disappear as it was right above my head. i think it glowed red for a mili-second after it went dark, my assumption was that it,(the space station) must have changed attitude so it wasn't reflecting light anymore. this is a little strange since i have seen the space station and shuttle fly over a few times and i could always follow them from horizon to horizon as they slowly came into and then faded from view. 
that got me watching the sky for a while, and i saw two shooting stars within a couple of minutes. (the light i saw was not a shooting star as i watched it move steadily for several seconds) 
the sighting i find interesting is the next one. i was facing north looking up, and i spotted another satellite. this one looked more like a "regular" satellite, not as bright as the first light i saw,(the space station), but clearly visible. i watched it for a few seconds as it moved steadily to the west. just as it crossed paths with another star, it "merged" with the star. i had a strong feeling of "did i just see what i saw?!" the sky was clear, and i could see the light clearly; instead of passing the star and continuing on its path, it simply "merged" or disappeared instantly. i've never seen a satellite disappear in mid-flight like that, and find it especially strange that if it did somehow change attitude and stop reflecting as the first light appeared to do, that it would happen at the exact moment that it passed behind a pin-point of light.
i stood glued to the spot, watching the star for about ten more minutes, half expecting to see the light re-emerge at some point, which it did not. i noted the time,(9:50) and the direction and the star positions. to me, it looked like a satellite, but i've never seen one appear to merge with a "star".
content.summary: Watched satellite-looking object in sky travel briefly then merge(?) with another star.

content.detailedDescription: It was in the summer time in the late 1980���s at night. i was with my family looking at the stars on a boat in the middle of lake kezar in lovell, maine when a very large black triangle ship silently flew lowly over us. i didn���t see any lights, but i could be wrong. i did see what looked like windows on the side. not 100% sure about the windows. i don���t remember it taking on water, but it could of before we saw it. it flew directly in the middle of the lake, and from the projected flight path it might of took prior it could of spent a few miles over the lake. after it flew over us it went into the mountains. it last about 5-10 minutes. unfortunately i don���t remember the exact date, but know it was in the summertime in the late 80���s. my family can verify the sighting, but they
content.summary: Black triangle over lake kezar in lovell maine in the late 1980's

content.detailedDescription: They flew south to north side by side in a zig zag motion.
content.summary: Two disk shaped objects

content.detailedDescription: I was outside taking my dog out and looked out west towards the sky where i saw a strange star that was flickering red, green, and some other color which i cannot remember. i thought nothing of it and looked away for 2 minutes. i turn back to look back at it again, but it was gone...I saw somebody else from illinois who posted the same thing i exactly saw and im telling you man you are not alone.
content.summary: Saw a star-like object that flashed in 3 different colors in glenview, illinois.

content.detailedDescription:
I was looking westward from my back patio at 10;35 pm. at first it appeared to be an aircraft, but it's extreme slow movement would exclude that. it did have lights similar to an aicraft, red, green or perhaps blue and white. the bright blinking colors first caught my attention. then the fact that it wasn't moving, mystified me, so i called out my wife, daughter and her boyfriend. the three of us observed it for about 15 minutes. it first appeared in the west sky just above tree top level, then slowly, very slowly moved into the trees and out of sight. observed with both 10 x 25 and 10 x 50 binoculars. only the lights were visable. total movement: about the lenght of my thumb at arms lenght. best description of the movement...Straight line drifting. lost visability at 10:50. sky clear, stars and aircraft clearly visiable.
this was no star or planet since it did move. it was no aircraft since the movement was so slow. perhaps some hoaxer set free a ballon with dangling lights, but only the lights were visible with the binoculars. hopefully others got a better vantage point.
content.summary: Star or planet like with white green(blue) and red

content.detailedDescription: I was driving as a delivery driver on mckee road, san jose, california, somewhere between north king road and north 33rd street.  it was (very approximate time) about 2:00 p.M. on a weekday.  i was driving from north king road going towards hwy 101.  i was extremely busy and extremely preoccupied with communicating with my dispatcher via my nextel.  in the midst of this extreme preoccupation with my work, i suddenly saw (as i was driving) a very large, circular gray-colored object approximately 15 feet above a house, hovering and not moving (about the same size as the house) on the south side of mckee road (my left).  it was not moving.  i felt stunned.  at first, i thought two things:  i thought it was either a helium man-made craft resembling a "flying saucer" or an actual ufo.  i was fixed on this object in the sky (approximately 15 feet from a house), but i was so preoccupied with my work and communications with my dispatcher (and driving safely) that i did not look back at this viewing immediately.  it was probably before i reached north 33rd street that i finally turned around to view same spot.  when i finally turned around to view this object, i then saw that the gray circular object had disappeared.  i could not see it anymore.  i was still so preoccupied with my work/deliveries that i did not stop to record dates and exact streets.  i was stunned (and very busy at work).  if it was helium man-made it wouldn't have disappeared so quickly.  the date is very approximate.  the time is very approximate.  i'm pretty sure the street is correct.  i absolutely know what i saw.  the most prevelant feeling i felt was stunned.  simply stunned.
content.summary: Hovering approx 15 feet above a house, not moving.

content.detailedDescription:
I was photographing the farmlands while riding the strasburg r.R. with my wife and son.

when we reviewed the photos on our laptop, two of them had unusual objects in the sky. they appear to be two views of the same object. we noticed nothing in the sky while taking the photos.

the object doesn't appear to be an anomoly on the lens, and it doesn't look like a bird or any aircraft i am familiar with, but i am no expert, so i submitted it here.
content.summary: Didn't notice until after viewing digital photos

content.detailedDescription: As i was heading out to the parking lot after work i looked at the sky and noticed this metallic object. i looked over to my friend and said "hey! look a ufo!". we both stood there and watched this object glide through the sky, always staying at the same altitude throug the whole duration. at first we both thought that the wind picked up some trash and was carring it away, but the object appeared to be spinning and even though it dipped (like a kite) it managed to stay at the altitude. it's hard to detemine the size of the object but it was big enough to see and keep track of until it vanished. we both watched the object for around 5 minutes just spinning and heading in a north - northeast direction. i was suprised to see something like that during the busy part of the day and in the same air lane that heliocopters fly.
content.summary: Metallic, rectangle

content.detailedDescription:
Last night at 1;00 a.M. i went to my bedroom and lay down.  after a minute i decided to get up and take a last look out my north-facing bedroom window (as i had done periodically throughout the evening) to see if the object(s) i had seen 2 nights previously were in sight.  i noticed a star-like light in approximately the same position in the northeastern sky as i had 2 nights previously, so i got my bushnell binoculars to take a closer look.  what i saw was apparently the same object i had observed before (ref mufon report 26 aug 2008: "ufos hovering over dayton international airport").  the object had white-yellow, blue, and red lights in the same configuration as before.

i went out to the front yard at about 1:05 a.M. and observed the same object. it was in approximately the same position as 2 nights previous, but noticably higher and a little further southeast of the airport. i would estimate it to be about 1/4 to 1/2 mile southeast of the dayton airport and approximately 1000 ft. in altitude.  i scanned the sky with and without binoculars to see if i could spot any other curious lights.  all i could see were planets and stars.  i could locate no other object as i had 2 nights previously.

i went inside and woke my mom (approximately 1:10 a.M.) and she came to my bedroom window and observed the same phenomenon both with and without the binoculars.  we watched it from the window for about 10 minutes then went out to the front yard and observed it from there as well.  we stayed outside for about 10 minutes and then went back in.  we continued to observed the object from my bedroom window and another north-facing window in another bedroom for about another 10 minutes.  during this time my mom and i both saw what appeared to be a small cesna-sized plane slowly fly southeast from the direction of the airport toward the ufo but beneath and slightly south of it.  this "plane" was probably 200 to 300 ft. below the ufo. the plane continued on it's same path until it was out of sight.  i did not hear an engine sound from this second object and usually planes at that distance are easily audible. i see and hear these type planes every day at this airport and think it notable that i heard nothing on this night. it was now approximately 1:40 a.M.

my mom went back to her room and i continued to monitor the object from the window.  i lost the object behind some low clouds for about half an hour and didn't look for it again until about 2:30 a.M. i spotted it again in about the same position at about 2:45 a.M. and noticed through the binoculars that now there were no blue or red lights, but only white-yellow.  i noted there seemed to be 3 main lights evenly spaced in a horizontal line with some fainter lights of the same color in-between the main ones.  the ufo occasionally changed it's situation because sometimes it looked like an oval ring of white-yellow lights.  i could just make out a shadowy oval or disk shaped form that was barely illuminated by the lights on the object.

i noticed my mom's bedroom light still on at about 3:05 a.M. and went in to tell her that the object was still there but without the blue and red lights.  she came to my room and watched it for about 10 minutes and then we both went to the front yard again and observed it with the binoculars.  my mom saw the object at this time as a ring of white-yellow lights also.

we went back inside and to our rooms to sleep (~ 3:20 a.M.)  i last looked for the object at 4:30 a.M. and it was gone. 

both of us agreed we could not identify the object and had discussed the possibilities of what it might be throughout our night's observations.  we just didn't know but were very curious. 

the viewing conditions i would describe as fair throughout the whole evening.  it was partly cloudy with a rather low cloud ceiling.  the object would dim and brighten throughout the whole viewing period due to clouds and haze passing over it.  when there was a clearing in the cover, the object and stars were clearly visible.
content.summary: Ufo hovering near dayton international airport

content.detailedDescription:
I was touring the united states on my harley and had just crossed the yosemite park in the morning of the august 13th 2007.
i was sitted a a table in a restaurant at lee vining, california.
by the window beside me, i was seeing lenticular clouds over the tioga pass nearby. i took a picture of those clouds through the window.
i know that this type of clouds are sometimes mistakenly beleived to be ufos.
it is just lately when i look back at that picture that i found that dark conical object seeming to hover i the center of the picture.
i thought it may be a fly that was on the window when i took the picture but the zooming of the object reveals clearly light and shadow on it that could not be on a fly in a window. i have to admit that when i found it i was and i am still very excited about it.
as i did not even noticed it when i took the picture, i cannot tell how it was moving or if it was making any sound, etc.
looking at a map i saw that the place is just about 150 miles from area 51.
could it really be a ufo?
please tell me what it is.
content.summary: Conical object noticed on a picture of lenticular clouds near yosemite park, california

content.detailedDescription:
On saturday 23rd august 2008, my husband and i were having a bbq with a group of friends in our garden in dorking, surrey (uk) when, around 21.05hrs, one of our group happened to look upwards and noticed bright orange objects (which to the naked eye appeared orb shaped) travelling silently across the night sky.  it was very dark at the time, but relatively clear and there was no wind at all. 

we had no idea what they were, so i grabbed my video camera and captured some very interesting footage.  when i zoomed in on them, the objects appeared flower shaped - a bright orange circular centre surrounded by smaller brighter orange circles (i���ve since extracted some intriguing stills from this footage). 

i���ve trawled the internet for information and these things don���t look like either chinese lanterns or fake ufo/weather balloons. we counted 20+ of them and they travelled (some in clusters, some separately) at a moderate pace and in a very controlled fashion across the night sky, only disappearing as they went past the high trees that surround our garden.  

the 13 adults present were awe-struck, none of us had ever seen anything like this spectacle before, but the three children with us were really scared, fearing we were about to be invaded by aliens. 

the footage i took looks far more detailed than the videos i���ve seen so far, did anyone else see these things or does anyone know what they could have been?
content.summary: 20+ orange flower shaped objects in the night sky.

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i seemed to have witnessed some unusual red lights in the sky above el cajon, ca around 8:35 p.M. on 8/28/08. my friend was in the jacuzzi and i was inside his house reading the sports section of the newspaper. he called my attention saying that he was seeing satellites in the sky. so i opened the door to the backyard and looked in up in the sky and immediately noticed two red lights that were blinking back and forth and seemed to be connected somehow as if they were on a straight line. i said immediately after seeing the lights, "what the hell is that?" it was obviously not a satellite or satellites. what struck me and my friend was the distance between the two lights. the lights were too far apart to be like lights on the wing of an aircraft. this was at my friends house, he lives under a flight path so we've seen many planes in the night's sky. this was no plane. these lights made no sound and moved at a smooth seemingly constant pace until they faded into the distance. i don't know what these lights were, but i feel that they were significantly strange. i've never seen anything like this before, so i felt i should share this experience. i don't expect any explanation or closure on this sighting; i just felt that i should share the information that i saw something strange in the sky.
content.summary: Strange red lights

content.detailedDescription:
it was a clear moonless night with stars visible and all. i had just taken my dog outside to relieve himself and was walking him out into the grass field. i've recently taken a liking to spotting satellites orbiting the earth at night, so i was just standing out there staring up at the sky trying to notice any 'moving stars'. after maybe eight minutes of being outside, i noticed a slight flicker to my right in the sky. so i turned and concentrated at that area but couldn't see anything. i then resumed looking back directly up in the sky. after 10 seconds, i noticed a slight flicker in the same spot and had decided to just keep looking in that direction. again i saw the flicker and decided it was obviously a plane and was able to ignore it as i went back to trying to spot satellites as i pass the time.

 perhaps 20 seconds later, i looked back to the same spot again and noticed a 'plane' flying across the sky. since i hadn't found anything of interest in the sky, i decided to just watch that 'plane' out of boredom. after a while of staring at it, i began to notice and realize things about it. the first thing i noticed was the speed it was traveling and the size of the 'plane'. at first glance, it seemed it either had to be a really huge plane far off in the distance. or it had to just be an average sized plane just not so far in the distance. if it were to be the latter, then it would have still had been traveling extremely slow for a plane. i figured when planes go somewhere... they actually go somewhere. this 'plane' was moving, just not very fast. i assumed it was just a plane doing a routine survey or something... 

 the second thing i noticed about this 'plane' were the lights. i realized that any other plane i've ever seen at night have had constantly flashing lights and usually just two, perhaps a blue and a red. but this 'plane' was different. the lights on it weren't flashing at all. it also had three lights. two amber colored lights, and one red light about half the size. so i thought that was odd, but again figured maybe some planes are like that. when i first saw it clearly with the lights, all i could really see were two lights at first, a bright amber and a red. since it was moving to my left with the bright amber light ahead, i could clearly see that the red light was the tail of the 'plane' (even though i could not see the body of the ufo, just the lights). the lights were also exactly even with each other. the two bright amber lights in front, while the red in the back; pretty much making a triangle. again, i'll remind that since it was flying from my right side to my left side across the sky, all i could clearly see were two lights.

 while staring at the 'plane', i started to think about how i've always wanted to witness a ufo and perhaps have it abduct me. i sort of laughed out loud and thought "yeah, that would be silly. but perhaps i would be willing to be abducted by aliens, as long as i wasn't harmed...". just at that very instant, i noticed the 'plane' change direction, but couldn't tell at first what it was doing. after two seconds, i saw the two bright amber lights and knew it was facing in my direction but still wasn't aware that it was coming right at me. i stood my ground just trying to make it out better then realized that it was indeed coming right at me. so it was then when i was starting to freak out that it started to head this way right when i wanted it to come this way... regardless, i still stood there, but ready to dart to the house. after another couple seconds of watching it come towards me, i decided to start walking towards the house while keeping my eye on it. it was amazing at how far away i thought it was and to see it start coming at me so quickly. the lights started getting really bright, large, and closer really fast. i then decided to start running as fast as i could when my dog started bolting to the door. i just continued running towards my porch and as i looked back, i could see that it was just so close and had the chill on my back as if it were right on me and was going to get right on top of me before i could get to my door. i was just praying to jesus and just kept running as fast as possible. i managed to reach my door just before it would have flown over me. i quickly got my dog inside but couldn't see the ufo at all as i had my head out the door for a couple seconds. that was when i started running down to my mom's room to explain to here what just happened.

 as i had gotten into her room, my mom was talking on the phone and i was breathing heavy. she noticed me and urgently asked me what's wrong. i then started to tell her that i was chased by a ufo in the field. while i explained to her my story, i realized that the ufo didn't make any sound at all during my experience.

 while i was running towards my house, three scenarios came into my head. all giving me enough reason to want to freak out and run for cover.

a) it was a plane that for some reason had made a 90 degree angle and started to make a crash landing towards me.
b) it was an alien ufo that had decided to respond to my thoughts and come abduct me. (perhaps coincidence with it responding to my thoughts)
or
c) it was purely demonic.

either way, any of these were good enough reason for me to want to run. if planes do make random right angle turns, speed up, and get lower to the ground, then sure i'll accept the fact it was just a plane. otherwise i know it was something else... demonic force or alien ufo, i know what i saw and it was the scariest experience of my life.. and i've had really scary experiences in my life...
content.summary: Saw three lights far in the distance going to my left then taking an immediate right angle turn towards me. getting faster, lower, closer.

content.detailedDescription:
I was admiring the storm clouds over the glasshouse mountians as i waited for the bus, watching them drift. early on i noticed one cloud which i thought 'hey, that's a ufo shape!' but figured it was a cloud. i continued to see it as i waited, the 'cloud' didn't move at all even though the huge storm clouds were drifting along around it... i was amused, i took photos of it. the top of it was fluffy, like a cloud, like a topping over the smooth white saucer ovel shape which was why i didn't think anything more of it, but it was very very white where as the clouds around it were all that dark grey stormy look.

the next part happened all at once.  i saw an old fashioned plane entered the air in the area, slowly, quietly. it seemed to turn, so that it was narrow below the fluffy part... like an ovel, like a () shape, then as the plane came closer it suddenly vanished... no sign of it whatsoever... leaving behind the fluffy cloud part that'd been on top. i was taking photos as i watched the old fashioned plane, and this cloud, (i can't zoom in with this camera so it was impossible not to) so i have the series of photos... i will get them off the camera as soon as possible.
content.summary: Ufo hiding in clouds.

content.detailedDescription: There was a formation,the head leader would go first, then the others would follow.
content.summary: Cluster of 3 circle objects

content.detailedDescription:
This was a daylight sighting on a very clear and calm day that i noticed a small round metallic object very high in sky (this is in reno nv) coming from the n moving directly over the city, distinctly moving to the se, again very slowly, at one point split into two objects then returned to one, and repeated then returned to one. made several quick moves to the right then to the left but maintained distinct course towards the se. the object was not affected by upper atmosphere wind or anything and clearly appeared to be powered by its own means. at one point after about 10 minutes it began a slow change of course towards the sw, again movement was very slow and deliberate. 
i work in a 4 story building on the 2nd floor with ,many large windows facing directly to the n with a clear view of the north, west and east. so , when i turned around at my desk and stood up this object caught my eye immediately and as i began to watch i realized it was something other than a stray balloon . it was so far up in the sky i cannot estimate its size, the only thing i can use to estimate it's size and distance from me  was a commercial jet which was up in the sky moving from s to n a short time after i started watching the object and as it flew "under" it, i could see the object was very very far out. this object was witnessed by several of my co-workers who also feel its almost impossible for this to be a balloon as it clearly had a course of travel. as it moved towards the sw i lost sight as it flew out of range and i was unable to go outside to continue watching it. total time that i saw this object was about 15 minutes.
content.summary: Small bright metallic object moved from n to sw very slow rate of speed , splitting into 2 then returning to 1, then repeated

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 2:30 pm, two witnesses and i were at a cemetary in 
"--------" holding a "ghost hunt" research on the graveyard. we had cameras, cell phone & digital camera/video taker present. 

we were deciding where we wanted to start first and took a brief look around & talked about it for a brief time. i suggested that we take a look upward from time to time to check out the big expanse of sky above us for any unusual activity that might occur and when i initially said this, i took a look upward in one direction, then turning my head to another part of the sky, i then exclaimed something on the idea of "what the heck is that?" 

both witnesses with me looked skyward where i was looking and we all saw what appeared to be row after row of same sized circles of "vapor" spaced equally in a shape that was a perfect rectangle, traveling overhead diagonally.

i was in disbelief & stood frozen for a short time as we all gazed upward. i remember one witness ask "are you getting this?" and i suddenly snapped out of what i think was a touch of shock & started taking pictures fumbling over my camera options trying to set it on automatic to get still shots before they got too far away. i managed to get a few digital camera shots in. i switched my kodak easy share 2710 digital camera to videoand fumbled for few minutes while i tried to focus on them.

at this time they were further off in the distance and i tried to zoom in on them, but had some difficulty. with my eye & the video, i did notices that a second fleet seemed to come into view further off. i had trouble filming the target because the sun was shining on my back therefore my face was reflecting on the screne where you view what your filming before taking a picture or when taking a video. i had to use my eyes to line up the best i could with the ufo fleet passing by.

one witness didnt get anything, they were using there cell phone & the other witness did get some still shots in.

overall what we all had seen that day was highly unidentified, definately not a plane, or planes. i am certain they were not clouds & certain it was no blimp, or balloons or even planes that make messages in the sky.

they were all the same size, vapor circles, traveling all toether in unison, after they went in a cloud (or above) they came out a little disorganized than their regular formation, but kept traveling and apparently there was another group that joined them. they appeared to be heading from "----" toward i believe "-----". 

this sighting took place on sunday, august 17 at approximately 2:30pm.

i believe what we saw as unidentified. 
i was shocked, excited, baffled, amazed at the time of sighting & after sighting.
the objects actions and motions were: traveling rather slow, uniform formation of rectangle (like an army) not uniform while further away and no trails were visible on each individual craft.
i did not know wht the object was when i first saw it. i was baffled and in a bit of shock, dazed.
i looked upward and noticed the formation after exclaiming that my witness and i should do so now and again while "ghost hunt" was in progress.
we didnt lose object, object kept traveling quietly into the distance. there was no noise what so ever, except a plane approaching formation of moving objects. i could not find the plane while video taping.
content.summary: Ufo fleet

content.detailedDescription: Noticed object small round and reflecting sun light very high in atmosphere, coming from the north moving distictly towards the south east at a very slow rate, made some quick movements to the right then to the left but resumed the slow movement, obviously being propelled by its own power(not the wind) then it split into two distinct objects, then back into one, then into two again, then back to one all the while continuing on the the same path towards the south west. then at one point it changed course and began heading towards the west to south west. all the time the object was in view it was getting higher and higher into the atmosphere but maintaining a very distict rate of travel. i along with several co- workers witnessed this, and one saw the "split" as well. i was working at the time,in a 4 story building, i am on the second floor facing directly north with several very large windows for view in all directions. i noticed the object simply because of standing up, and looking out into the sky as it was very clear and bright and the object immediately caught my eye. at first i thought it was a balloon, but then it became very apparent this object was moving under its "own" power and not by the wind and because it continuted in a distinct course i ruled out a balloon. this is my first day light sighting it was interesting, and i was glad i was not the only one witnessing it for the first time. i lost sight of the object simply because it moved out of my range of view in the building and because i was working i was unable to go outside to follow its movement.
content.summary: Round shiny object extremely high in atmosphere moving slowly from n to s, splitting into 2 then back to one , then moved distintly towards the west

content.detailedDescription: At 10:14 pm eastern time, on tuesday, august 19th, 2008. a friend and myself witnessed this object hovering over the tree line to the north of the lake (smoke lake, in dwight ontario). it was pulsing blue, red, and white as well as hovering. while on his dock we noticed it for aprox. 10 minuets, and returned inside the cottage. there are no cellular telephone towers (near that location), helicopters, or aircraft around at the time. this is a heavily forested area in northern ontario (algonquin park). it is not to be confused as a star or planet. it has not been seen again. it is my belief it was a ufo but my friend speculates it was a star, contrary to the fact he says he hasn't seen it again. we first noticed the object because of the silence, lack of aircraft/cellular tower, and the change of light. it was round, and just hovered. it hasn't been seen again.
content.summary: Hovering, pulsing 3 colors of light over tree-line

content.detailedDescription: I was 18 years old it was deer season and my father and i were out hunting not too far outside of town.  we always hunted in the same area and parked the truck in the same area.  he would go over the hill to his favorite spot and i would do like wise which was about halfway up the next hill.  from my vantage point i could clearly see the truck parked on top of the hill.  we always hunted like this so that a hill would be between us allowing for a greater firing range without worrying about hitting each other.  the day progressed like usual and we met at the truck for lunch about 1pm.  after lunch, we again went to our respective spots.  i went back and sat against my usual tree.  suddenly i heard a noise in the leaves, i look over and see three does standing about 20 feet away.  i was surprised that they were there and never saw them coming.  the woods are fairly open and i just don't see how i didn't see them.  i fumbled with my rifle in surprise and as they ran off i noticed that things looked different.  i checked my watch and over two hours had passed!  i had never fallen asleep hunting before.  i turned to look at the truck to see if my father had returned.  sitting next to the truck was a sphere shaped (perfectly round) very shiny, chrome like something.  i had no idea what it was.  it was about 15 feet in diameter.  i looked back at the deer running away for just a matter of seconds and when i looked back at the truck, the sphere was gone.  not too long afterwards my father returned to the truck and signaled that it was time to go home.  when i returned to the truck i notices a flattened area in the grass off to one side.  i can't be 100 percent certain that it wasn't there before, but i remember looking for where the deer had bedded down for the night and i don't remember any flattened grass that close to the truck.  i asked my father if anyone else had driven up there and he said that noone had.  i really don't know if this is the "missing time" phenomenon that i have read about, i truly may have fallen asleep.  but i don't see what else that sphere could be.  the sun was over the hill and there no other vehicles parked there.
content.summary: Sphere shaped approximately 15 feet in diamater.  very shiny, like polished chrome.

content.detailedDescription:
this sighting took place in late october, 2005 at approximately 9:30pm cst. being an amateur astronomer since childhood, i stepped outside just before going to bed for a casual look at the night sky. i did not have my telescope or binoculars with me, i now wish that i did. while i was looking to the west there was nothing unusual to observe only dim to moderately bright stars, nothing inusual. then all of a sudden a very bright object just appeared out of knower. it was as if someone had turned on a light switch. it did not fly into view it just appeared. this took me by total surprise. 

the object was no bigger then a bright star and had a slight yellowish hue to it, similar to the planet jupiter when it is at its brightest. it was completely motionless just staying in one spot. its glow was steady and did not have the flickering effect noticed when you look at a star. i could not distinguish any shap to the object only its bright glow.

at first i thought i had observed a nova burst an exploding star. i continued to observe the object for around ten minutes, it did not move but stayed in one spot. not knowing what to expect next i stayed outside and did not want to go inside for my binoculars and possibly miss something. i then noticed that the object was changing position, moving very slowly to the south. its movement was so slow that if it was not for the background stars as a reference you would not have noticed that it was moving. i continued to watch the object for around twenty minutes until it disappeared behind a tree line in the distance. the object did not change in brightness or speed. its movement was very smooth and made no sound nor give off any noticable exhaust or trial of any kind.

as i mentioned above i have been into astronomy since childhood and have never experienced such an event. there is nothing celestial that could account for this incident. meteors, comets nor asteroids could not account for what i observed. celestial objects do not appear out of knower, hover in one place for several minutes then slowly move off and disappear.

having been in the us air force from 1964-67 i had considerable experience observing aircraft in flight (single & formation flying) during the day and at night. no aircraft that i know of could account for what i observed. this was not a coventional aircrfat unless it was some form of black box stealth design which is possible but i highly unlikely it does not fit our current stealth designs. 

it was during a recent tv broadcast covering interstellar space flight possibilities that one of the scientists discussing ufos felt that if ufos are real it was possible that they could be using what he called a jump drive process. i did not really undewrstand what he was saying except that a space craft could be at one place in time, go thriugh a jump drive process and reappear at another place an time. some knd of worm hole or something. since the object i observed just appeared out of knower could it have been the result of a jump drive process.

it also appears that ufos have ther ability to travel at phenominal speeds and can instantly stop on a dime so to speak. it also appears that they are not plauged by atmospheric friction problems as our shuttle craft and other re-entry vehicles experience. with that in mined, could the object i observed have been a space craft traveling on a direct path toward the earth at such a phenominal speed which after entering our atmosphere and air space had just suddenly stopped which accounted for the objects sudden appearnce.

i don't know the answer. i only bring this sighting to you attention in hopes of providing something of value to the ufo investigations.
content.summary: Ufo sighting exhibiting the effects of a possible jump drive flight process.

content.detailedDescription:
This happen on august 25th, 2008 around 9:30 pm central time in saint louis. i'm a usual stargazer as i love to look at the sky and admire its beauty in our front yard. i have had ufo experiences previously so i also go outside to see if i can see any activity up in the sky. (please read below for more!). i saw this star-like ufo traveling north west. it was extremely high up. it seemed hundreds if not thousands of feet above the atmosphere. it has no blinking lights as it looked like a star. it was traveling straight and slow and then it slowly disappeared because of the streetlight. when i saw it i was excited and had my eyes on it for most of the time and i knew it wasn't a plane and then with further observing i knew it wasn't any earth vehicle or satellite, it was one of them!

-----------------------------------------------

previous sight & information

this happen on august 11th, 2008 around 9:30 pm central time in saint louis. i'm a usual stargazer as i love to look at the sky and admire its beauty in our front yard. i have had ufo experiences previously and i also go outside to see if i can see any activity up in the sky. (please read below for more!). i saw this star-like ufo traveling down south. it was extremely high up. it seemed hundreds of feet above the atmosphere. it has no blinking lights as it looked like a planet. it was traveling straight and slow and then it slowly disappeared which appeared the object had cloaked. when i saw it i was excited and had my eyes on it for most of the time and i thought is that a plane and then with further observing i knew it wasn't any earth vehicle or satellite. 

i have had many experiences like this in the past since 2001. i have seen several like this one this year. i seen a ginormous ufo a few weeks prior which appeared to be as big as jupiter traveling north which behaved like the one i saw on the 11th. i have seen these behave different in many ways. i have seen them travel back and forth, and cloak and uncloak like a peek-a-boo or a now you see me, now you don't game. i have recently seen one that was going down east which the entire object was flashing but it was a very slow flashing characteristic. now, i have seen two that were not like these a couple years ago. these were on two separate days. they both were extremely high but had a very unusual red flashing characteristic and the one went into hyperspace or warp speed like you see in the star wars and star trek films. that was incredible to witness! i believe these red ones are man made but has alien technology. i have been wondering so long what these are and who/what might be piloting them. it is a wonderful but creepy feeling that i get when i see these objects because i wonder are they the grays, the insectoids or something that we know absolutely nothing about or all of these different species. by seeing these ufos i know that we are not alone! if anyone has any answers and/or has had these experiences please contact me at capri1981@aol.Com with your information!
content.summary: Star or planet like ufo moving nw! plus an update!

content.detailedDescription:
A section of roseville rd., in sacramento country, travels directly through the now defunct mcclellan afb. i was traveling on this part of roseville rd. with a female companion, in a southwest direction on , what i recall being a late spring or early fall evening in 1966 or early '67. we witnessed the sudden appearance of a ball of green fire to our right. i assumed it was some sort of explosion from the base until i noticed that not only did it not dissipate, it moved very close to our vehicle and began to follow along side. its color was quite remarkable but there was no mistaking it to be fire. it had a tail, yet i do not recall any smoke being emitted from its tail section or from above it. it did not appear menacing but left no doubt, in my mind, that it was intensely observing us. i don't recall it making any sound. it was well within 100 feet of our vehicle and within 30-40 feet from the ground and traveling at approximately 45mph. it seemed to change intensity of color but remained green. when i slowed, it slowed and held its position. it was a fairly large ball and i remember thinking it strange that there were no alarms or any detectable activity from the military base. as i remember, the event occurred for approximately 30-45 seconds, maybe longer. there was another strange occurrence that night that i have never fully understood, so i will not attempt to explain it at this time. i've never reported this before because it seemed like just another unexplainable oddity and the object did not fit the profile of any ufo i had ever heard of. recently i ran a search to see if anyone had ever seen a green fireball anomaly and was surprised to find others have seen them.

i would like to add a pet peeve, if i may. i've always been puzzled as to why nasa scientists have put so much effort into researching the possibilty of life ever existing on mars? the planets are moving toward the suns gravitational pull, not away from it. so if there were any signs of life ever existing on another planet, it would most likely be found on a planet that, at one time, held the same solar position as earth and that would be in front of us, not behind us. shouldn't they be looking at venus?
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Green fireball followed vehicle, at upper right side.

content.detailedDescription: Going outside to smoke. smoking in barracks  not allowed. a coworker steps outside to join me. everyone else (5 or so more friends) inside still watching a movie. i see an aircraft approaching perpendicular towards our airstrip. too high. coming in steep. no blinking lights to identify it. i point it out to my friend. we watch, expecting to see usaf aircraft pursue it. minutes go by. moving steeper in a downward decline, gradually faster. i observe that it may be a meteor, in which case we better leave the top floor and move to lower ground. aircraft very large and very bright by now (approx. 4:00" into sighting). everyone steps out to watch. all of us are pretty scared now. as soon as we all gather to watch, a large light ring flares, radially away from the light, parallel to the earth. i now realize that it is indeed very high up. our fear freezes us all into pure silence. we all know that it's a comet or something, and coming directly towards were we stood. a few seconds after light ring, the object halts instantly. flashes brightly. breaks into 2 pieces. one much smaller. the other maintaining original size. resumes descent- in opposite directions. both objects, moving quite fast but easy to discern shape and dimension, appear to both be spherical and moving intelligently. descent turns into upward curves upward- both, still in opposite directions. curves turn to paths away from one another, parallel to the earth. smaller piece (on the left- now at 6-7" into sighting) halts entirely. looms. larger piece, a few seconds later halts. looms. both flash very brightly and turn off. not disappear, but simply stop glowing. can't really recall how we knew that they were still there but everyone in the group commented on just that. what was a clear, cloudless night soon changed when enormous (cumilonimbus) clouds appeared where the two light spheres once were. exactly where they once were. the stars obscured by clouds that now grew and grew to cover them. over the clouds, however, it appeared that there was also black looking smoke coming from those two points. did they explode?Get shot down? cross dimensions? anything is possible from this point, really. total time spent on the event was approx. 15" minutes or so.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Metoric in appearance. broke into 2 arials. turn into clouds at the end.

content.detailedDescription:
Hi,
like 2 months ago (19th or 20th june) i shot some random pictures out of my window of the night sky.
after downloading it to the pc i noticed some strange/weird line at the upper left corner. i still cant figure out what it is (i'm a physics student), so here you are ;)
i did not see the line with my own eyes, just with the camera. i cant remember if i did not look hard enough or if it just was not visible.

its on three pictures: 59, 60 and 62. picture 61 doesnt show the area in which the line is or would have been located. but 58 and 57 does show the area, without the line.
if you try to get the position of the line by comparing it to the position of two stars right to the line you will notice that its moving downwards with increasing picture number. sadfully picture 62 was the last one, so i dont know cleary how long it was 'visible'.
i cant remember the time between the pictures, but it could be something between 7 and 40 seconds each. which means that it would have been at the sky 28 seconds upto 160 seconds. so its definitely no meteor or something.



could you please tell me what this line is or by what it is caused?

thank you!
regards, 
nico
content.summary: Some weird line in three pictures of the night sky

content.detailedDescription:
While on vacation in sedona az..Had my sony cybershot on auto focus and auto flash.While starring at the small screen on camera..I noticed a flash at about the same time my camera flashed(if it did)..Like a secondary flash or something.Didnt give it more than 2 seconds thought until days later when i was showing pics on 61" hdtv screen. ive shown it to a couple of peole in tho photo industry and have been told "solar flare" and "never seen aything like it"..If anyone has an idea id like to hear it.  email me at:  kdeem2323@cox.Net

karim
content.summary: Original photo of event reported earlier

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter and i were walking her dog in our yard.  my daughter saw it and called my attention to it.

we saw a very bright disc above the clouds going south east at a steady speed.  we watched untill it disapeared behind clouds.  prior to losing sight of it, we saw it go behind and emerge from a small cloud.  the course always remained the same.

there was no contrail, or navigation lights.  the normal flight path for aircraft here is east and west.

this was brighter than any star.  as bright as the moon on a clear night.  the moon wasn't visible that night.

our home is approx. 400 feet from the pa., ohio state line.
content.summary: Medium alitude, bright disc, above clouds, going south /south east

content.detailedDescription:
On monday, august 25, 2008 i was driving eastbound on third street in williamsport pa when i took two pictures while driving with my lg env2 2.0 mega pixel camera phone of the goodyear blimp.  after reviewing the pictures later that day i noticed an object on the second picture of a cigar shaped object above the goodyear blimp.

the day was clear and sunning without a visible cloud ceiling at 12:15 hrs est.  i was driving approximately 10-15 mph near the rite aid at 1913 e. 3rd street in williamsport in loyalsock twp.  i noticed the goodyear blimp off to my right and decided to take a picture of it since it was flying around williamsport after the little league world series games.

a minute later the blimp was directly in front of me when i decided to take the second picture.  i held the phone camera with both hands and braced both arms against the steering wheel to stabilize the picture and snapped it.

after returning from the trip, i reviewed the pictures taken and noticed an object to be cigar shaped above the blimp at a 1 o���clock position when the picture was zoomed in on the blimp.
content.summary: Picture of a cigar shaped object above the goodyear blimp in williamsport pa while driving
